extendedInfo.description: Stunning effects! Explosive graphics! The most shining tower defense game on Android.Features:* Stunning Graphics, Particle Effects and Animations & Fast, Arcade Action.* 16 types of towers, 15 types of enemies, infinite combinations!* 6 super maps with the designed maze.* Auto-saves Game when interrupted.* 10 difficulty levels, armory, ect.* Easy to Play, Very Tough to Master!* OpenFeint supported.* 1 level available in Free version, if you like it please purchase full version, thank you.------------------------------Try other awesome games by Cat Studio------------------------------"Egypt Zuma - Temple of Anubis" - A Zuma game with egypt theme."Little Commander - World War II TD" - A TD game with very cute visual style."Soldiers of Glory : World War 2" - Act as the Allied commander and win the WWII!"Soldiers of Glory : Modern War" - A TD game that enemies could attack you back!"Epic Defense - the Elements" - A TD game with war3 visual style."Epic Defense 2 - Wind Spells" - the second work of Epic Defense series, more new elements! more new towers!"Galaxy Wars Defense" - A Space Sci-Fi TD with Stunning Graphics and Super Big Maps!"Zerg Must Die" - A TD game with SC2 style. The gameplay very like Defense Grid"Marble Blast - Zodiac" - Another very good Zuma Game, and you can draw your custom levels!"Global Defense: Zombie War" - Do you like killing zombies? Fans of World War Z will like this defense game! ------------------------------Cat Studio's Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/CatStudioGamesCat Studio's Tiwtter: https://twitter.com/CatStudio_GamesCat Studio's Youtube Channel: https://youtube.com/CatStudioGames------------------------------

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: First tower defence game- very impressed, neon, lazers, explosions, sirens-  really cool.
reviews.author: rob fenton

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Despite being a knockoff, it\'s still fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: neon defense
reviews.comment: over all not a bad game,fix the bugs when i resume my game and i will give u 5stars
reviews.author: Michael Madercic

reviews.title: Nice try.
reviews.comment: Does Candystand games know about your terrible and poorly thought out ripoff of their vector tower defense game?  It\'s like vector TD with none of the strategy.  If you had at least ripped off the game mechanics exactly, the blue towers wouldn\'t be so completely nerfed.  Try writing your own original games instead of ripping off free to play flash games by other devs.
reviews.author: Jason Lutz

reviews.comment: Nice tower defence game. The fonts are too small on my U20i
